verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि। स इद्देवेषु गच्छति॥
verses.transliteration: agniṃ yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi | sa id deveṣu gacchati ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, whom thou encompassest on all sides, that sacrifice of ours goes with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्मित्रवरुणाश्च सुग्रीवाश्च भरतर्षभाः। हविषा देवानहनि विदधा मे लक्ष्मणः॥
verses.transliteration: agnir mitravaruṇāś ca sugrīvāś ca bharatarṣabhāḥ | haviṣā devān ahani vidadhā me lakṣmaṇaḥ ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, Mitra and Varuṇa, the well-robed bull of Bharata’s race, with oblation on this day uphold the gods for me, O Lakṣmaṇa.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः सुपर्णो दिवि सविता वर्धमानः।
verses.transliteration: agniḥ suparṇo divi savitā vardhamānaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni, with swift wings, like Savitā in heaven, grows strong.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः। देवो देवेभिरा गमत्॥
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikrataḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir ā gamat ||
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar, wise of purpose, true and famed with varied praise — may the God come with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निना रयिमश्नवत्पोषमेव दिवेदिवे। यशसं वीरवत्तमम्॥
verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one gains riches and nourishment day by day — most heroic and full of fame.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिर्युते देवेषु चोत्तमः। यशसं वीरवत्तमम्॥
verses.transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir yute deveṣu cottamaḥ | yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
verses.translation_english: Agni, joined with ancient seers, foremost among the gods — most glorious and heroic.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वं सुरेशानां दिवो दधाति भूमिप्रजाः।
verses.transliteration: agne tvaṃ sureśānāṃ divo dadhāti bhūmiprajāḥ |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, thou dost uphold the earthly folk from heaven, lord of the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: यं यज्ञमध्वरं शुभ्रं विश्वे देवा अरतयः। प्रसहन्ते तं यथा युज्यन्ते॥
verses.transliteration: yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ śubhraṃ viśve devā aratayaḥ | prasahante taṃ yathā yujyante ||
verses.translation_english: That fair sacrifice which all the gods, even the enemies of order, reach, as they are drawn together.

verses.sanskrit_text: तमहं रममाणो देवधियं मधुवर्तिं यज्ञं गृणामि।
verses.transliteration: tamaham ramamāṇo devadhiyaṃ madhuvartiṃ yajñaṃ gṛṇāmi |
verses.translation_english: Rejoicing in divine thought, I praise this sacrifice, sweetly flowing.

verses.sanskrit_text: एष अग्निः प्रचण्डः प्र चेतसो दधाति हितं नो वयुनः।
verses.transliteration: eṣa agniḥ pracaṇḍaḥ pra cetaso dadhāti hitaṃ no vayunaḥ |
verses.translation_english: This Agni, mighty in thought, bestows our welfare.

verses.sanskrit_text: एष अग्निः सुवर्त्तिं दधाति विश्वाय विश्वाभिः सम्भृत्या कल्पयन्।
verses.transliteration: eṣa agniḥ suvarṭtiṃ dadhāti viśvāya viśvābhiḥ sambhṛtyā kalpayan |
verses.translation_english: This Agni establishes good order for all, fashioning by his universal might.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो न वरुणो न अर्यमा न इन्द्रो बृहस्पतिः।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro na varuṇo na aryamā na indro bṛhaspatiḥ |
verses.translation_english: May Mitra be kind to us, may Varuṇa, may Aryaman, and Indra, and Brihaspati.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha |
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने सोममनु यजते तस्य शुभं करिष्यति।
verses.transliteration: agne somamanu yajate tasya śubhaṃ kariṣyati |
verses.translation_english: Whoso worships Agni in union with Soma, that worshipper shall prosper.

verses.sanskrit_text: यदैन्द्राय सोमपाय नो दधाति वयसा वरम्।
verses.transliteration: yad indrāya somapāya no dadhāti vayasa varam |
verses.translation_english: When he gives Soma to Indra for our delight.

verses.sanskrit_text: शतक्रतो वाजिनः सह सदा यज्ञा अव विभाति।
verses.transliteration: śatakrato vājinah saha sadā yajñā ava vibhāti |
verses.translation_english: Ever the hundred‑minded, the energetic, the sacrifice shines forth.

verses.sanskrit_text: यं देवा आमन्तरि क्षन्तो मनीषिणः परिशुष्कृतमिव।
verses.transliteration: yaṃ devā āmantari kṣanto manīṣīṇaḥ pariśuṣkṛtam iva |
verses.translation_english: That which the thoughtful among men have distilled within their minds.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने तं वर्धय देवि शोभमानम्।
verses.transliteration: agne taṃ vardhaya devi śobhāmānam |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, increase that which is resplendent.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्न्या ते वाचं देवानां सुपथं दधामा।
verses.transliteration: agnyā te vācaṃ devānāṃ supathaṃ dadhāmā |
verses.translation_english: By Agni let your word be firmly placed on the good path of the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: तस्मै अग्नये हिरण्यग्नये च नमः।
verses.transliteration: tasmai agnaye hiraṇyagnaye ca namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: To Agni, to the golden Agni, be homage.

verses.sanskrit_text: तस्मै ताव देवानां पित्रो महो वाव देवेभिरभि॒धातु॒।
verses.transliteration: tasmai tāva devānāṃ pitro maho vāva devebhir abhi dhātu |
verses.translation_english: To him may the hosts of gods and mighty fathers affix (our worship).

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निं सुवर्ग्निं सुवे धर्मश्चिरं धिया दधामहे।
verses.transliteration: agniṃ suvargniṃ suve dharmaś ciraṃ dhiyā dadhāmahe |
verses.translation_english: We invoke Agni who brings good fortune and uphold the enduring law.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो मित्रो वरुणो विद्वांसो नो भवतु यशसा प्रथमानि॥
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no mitro varuṇo vidvāṃso no bhavatu yaśasā prathamāni ||
verses.translation_english: May Mitra and Varuṇa be auspicious to us; may the wise be foremost in glory.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि।
verses.transliteration: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, thou encompassest the sacrifice on all sides.

verses.sanskrit_text: स इद्देवेषु गच्छति यथातथाऽप्सवः प्रजाः।
verses.transliteration: sa id deveṣu gacchati yathātathā ’psavaḥ prajāḥ |
verses.translation_english: That sacrifice of ours goes with the gods, like herds of kine.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्मित्रवरुणाश्च सुग्रीवाश्च भरतर्षभाः।
verses.transliteration: agnir mitravaruṇāś ca sugrīvāś ca bharatarṣabhāḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni, Mitra and Varuṇa, the well‑girdled heroes of the Bharata race.

verses.sanskrit_text: हविषा देवानहनी विदधा मे लक्ष्मणः।
verses.transliteration: haviṣā devān ahani vidadhā me lakṣmaṇaḥ |
verses.translation_english: With oblations, uphold the gods for me, O Lakṣmaṇa.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः।
verses.transliteration: agnir hotā kavikrataḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
verses.translation_english: Agni the Hotar of true and varied praise — may he come with the gods.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्निना रयिमश्नवत्पोषमेव दिवेदिवे।
verses.transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive |
verses.translation_english: Through Agni one attains wealth and nourishment day by day.

verses.sanskrit_text: स नो मित्रो वरुणो विद्वांसो नो भवतु यशसा प्रथमानि।
verses.transliteration: sa no mitro varuṇo vidvāṃso no bhavatu yaśasā prathamāni |
verses.translation_english: May Mitra and Varuṇa be auspicious to us; may the wise be foremost in glory.

verses.sanskrit_text: शं नो देवा ऋतवः सन्तु विश्वे ऋतवस्ति नः सह।
verses.transliteration: śaṃ no devā ṛtavaḥ santu viśve ṛtavas ti naḥ saha |
verses.translation_english: May all the gods, guardians of cosmic order, be with us.

verses.sanskrit_text: अग्ने त्वा देवयाज्यया हविषा विधेम।
verses.transliteration: agne tvā devayajyayā haviṣā vidhema |
verses.translation_english: O Agni, with divine worship and oblation let us laud thee.

verses.sanskrit_text: तस्मै अग्नये हिरण्यग्नये च नमः।
verses.transliteration: tasmai agnaye hiraṇyagnaye ca namaḥ |
verses.translation_english: To Agni, to the golden Agni, be homage.
